jyzer.items
Class Methods

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.items.Methods

public final class Methods
extends java.lang.Object

Cares for the method entries of the classfile.

Contains the following information:

  • u2 methods_count
    Gives the number of method_info structures in the methods table.
  • method_info mehtods[]
    Each value in the table must be a method_info structure, giving a complete description of a method in this class or interface. If the method is not native or abstract, the JVM instructions implementing the method are also supplied.

Version:
1.0, 2005 okt 12.
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver

Methods

public Methods(java.io.DataInput di)
        throws CorruptedClassfileException,
               java.io.IOException
This constructor reads the needed information from the given input, and creates the object.

Parameters:
di - an opened input (should be a DataInputStream, but can be exchanged with any subclass).
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
CorruptedClassfileException - if the classfile seems to be corrupted.

getMethodData

public java.lang.Object[][] getMethodData(boolean showOnlyRealModifiers)
Returns a 2 dimension representation of the methods (to put it into a table).

Parameters:
showOnlyRealModifiers - if should care only with real modifiers.
Returns:
the method data in a two dimensin array.
See Also:
AccessFlags

getHTMLDescription

public void getHTMLDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
Concatenates a HTML string that represents this class ( looks cool! ) to the end of the given StringBiulder object. Using this method for improve efficiency, cause I had a lot of problems with displaying such a long HTML text in an EditorPane.

Parameters:
sb - a StringBuilder that contains the string representation of the full classfile.

Returns:
the string representation of this object.
